rules.reasoning: GC metrics collected from {data.get('broker_count')} brokers - monitor trends for memory pressure
recommendations: GC metrics are cumulative since broker start
Monitor rate of increase, not absolute values
Rapid increases in old GC time indicate memory pressure
Typical healthy: < 5% time in young GC, < 2% in old GC
Consider increasing heap if GC time is consistently high
Use G1GC for heaps > 4GB (default in modern Kafka)
